description:
Nakiri Mana is the current Bookmaster of WGO. Mana bears a strong resemblance to Erina Nakiri except that Mana has long salmon-pink hair (in contrast to Erina`s orange hair) that is tied back, purple-pinkish eyes and small, round eyebrows.
Her first appearance in the manga saw Mana in a long, possibly traditional Japanese kimono, wearing a dark-colored cardigan and donning a traditional fan.
name: Nakiri Mana
